title: Bloomberg Markets: Pitkowsky on Investing in Energy
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Pitkowsky on Investing in Energy
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Larry S Pitkowsky Co-Managing Partner Goodhaven Capital Management Discussing the markets and investing in energy, including WPX Energy, which he says is a well run company with string management.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
